title.rendered: Free for Android & iOS: These Pro versions are currently free

content.rendered:
This Saturday, we once again put together a bulging package for the NextPit community. There you will find free premium apps and games for Android and iOS, which will soon be chargeable again.

You know how it works: We offer you a list of free downloads twice a week. These are not the free apps and mobile games that are always available for free. We focus on premium applications that are only available for free for a few days.


Test Zattoo free of charge for 30 days
The best live TV provider with over 120 channels on 4 devices

But time is of the essence, since we don’t know when Apple apps in particular will be chargeable again. It is therefore advisable for you to press the download button directly. How do we find the apps and games? You can read about that in Antoine’s post “How to find free apps”. In addition, we would also be pleased if you would point out relevant deals to us in the NextPit forum.

Another quick tip: If you are interested, always download it directly – even if you have no immediate use for the app. You can then delete them directly and install them again for free whenever you need them.

Free Android apps and games

Free Android Apps

  • How much can I spend? (EUR 2.99): A simple budget manager that will help you save money for future projects.
  • Equalizer Bass Booster Pro (EUR 1.89): Adjusts your phone’s audio settings, with an option to boost bass in apps and games.
  • Clipboard Pro (EUR 2.89): Adds additional functionality to your phone or tablet’s clipboard, with quick access via a floating shortcut. You can also search for copied items and export notes.
  • Per Qamp ((EUR 0.99): Every mobile phone already has a built-in music player, but Pro Qamp promises additional features like a 10-band equalizer, bass boost and other options for listening to your files in different formats.
  • Weather App Pro (EUR 4.19) [Endet Sonntag!]: This app, rated 4.6 stars, tells you what the weather will be like in the next few days and you can of course place it on your home screen as a stylish widget.

Free games for android

  • AceSpeeder 3 (EUR 0.89): High speed racing and zero gravity. This is reminiscent of the good days of games like F-Zero, Wipeout, and other console classics.
  • Fastar VIP (EUR 0.99): Cute graphic game in which you have to collect objects and develop your fairy.
  • The House ((EUR 0.59): The mysteries of a house full of monsters want to be unraveled. Can you escape the nightmare in this first person horror game?
  • Terra Fighter 2 Pro (EUR 0.89): If you’re up for a brawl, this is the place for you. The 3D death war game offers you a history and a duel mode.
  • A-2481 (EUR 0.59): In a secret Russian bunker, experiments are taking place in which people’s brains are controlled. You are the journalist of a small village newspaper who is supposed to bring light into the darkness.
  • Infinite Flight (EUR 0.99): With this flight simulator you can fly dozens of large civil aviation commercial aircraft as well as military aircraft. Unfortunately, some models are only available as part of a paid subscription.
  • 2048 (EUR 3.29): There should actually be a version of this casual game classic on every mobile phone. If you don’t have one, this is your chance, because the game is still free today.
  • Live or Die: Survival Pro (EUR 1.19):A virus has turned almost all of humanity into zombies. There is no innovation prize for the story, but that doesn’t really matter in zombie games, does it?
  • Everybody’s RPG (EUR 0.89): Another RPG in which you have to compete with players from all over the world and, of course, improve your team of heroes along the way.

Free iOS Apps & Games

Free apps for iOS

  • depello (EUR 4.90): Do you know this photo effect where only some objects are colored and the rest of the picture is black and white? This app promises to apply such effects on iPad or iPhone in an easy and fast way.
  • Stream Music Player (EUR 2.29): This app, already featured in previous editions of this list, is a music player that accesses your collection stored on online services like OneDrive, Google Drive, Dropbox.
  • iWoman (EUR 2.29): This is about women’s health. The app aims to help with menstrual cycle monitoring and family planning. Ben introduced you to iWoman in a separate post.
  • 720s: OBD-II digital gauges (EUR 1.09): Here you get access to the telemetry data of your vehicle – in real time. The app requires an OBD-II Wi-Fi adapter installed in the vehicle.
  • Angel Numbers Numerology (EUR 2.29): I don’t know much about numerology, but this app promises to help you understand the combinations and sequences that are repeated in our daily life.
  • One Sec – Take a deep breath (EUR 2.29): This mindfulness app is about taking a deep breath – and interestingly, every time you start a suitably configured app such as YouTube or Instagram on your smartphone.
  • Face/Face Photo Similarity App (EUR 2.29): This is a slightly different photo app idea: The app compares photos that you share, recognizes the faces – and then you can take two different faces and determine how similar they are.
  • AddOns Maker for Minecraft PE (EUR 3.49): With this app you create your own add-ons for Minecraft. You can create weapons, your own blocks and much more in no time at all and import them into your game.
  • Stress Relief Relax Meditation (EUR 4.49): And once again the topic of mindfulness! This app also wants to help you against stress and anxiety disorders, supports you in meditating and falling asleep.
  • Blur Background (EUR 1.09): Simple tool to cut out objects in your photos in no time at all or to blur backgrounds in five stages.

Free games for iOS

  • dungeon shooter (EUR 1.09): Independent first-person shooter game in which you explore tombs and dungeons to collect treasures amidst monsters and mysterious creatures.
  • Emoji Sudoku(EUR 5.49): Did you think we could go a week without a Sudoku guess? Check out this quirky twist that replaces the traditional numbers with emojis.
  • Color Tap (EUR 2.29): Coloring books never seem to go out of style. Take your hobby with you wherever you are with this app. Here you color in illustrations of different categories.
  • Infinite Flight Simulator (EUR 1.09): This flight simulator is also available for iOS for free. 167th place in the Racing Games category in the AppStore – I have no idea whether this position says anything about the quality of the game.
  • Lindabu (EUR 6.99): You want to aim for a YouTube or influencer career with your own vlog, but don’t dare yet? Then maybe you should try this simulation first.
  • Elloveo (EUR 5.49)Mission: Would you like to learn more about electricity and magnetism in an educational game? This science game gives you exactly this knowledge and is suitable for both kids and adults.
  • Tank Battle – Mini War (EUR 5.49): This classic tank game, based on the 1985 game “Battle City”, has made it back into our app tips.

And that’s it for this week. Do not forget, NextPit to follow on Facebook, Twitter and also on Telegram, so that you don’t miss any further free app offers for your mobile phone or tablet. If any of the above applications are no longer free, please leave a comment below. So: see you next week when we publish another such list with free apps and games for your Android or iOS device.
